name: Samurai Slice (BurningTheMidnightOil)
description:
The legends say about a samurai with a reversed blade katana... but this story is not about him.

This is the story of a samurai who fights in reversed position, with his back to the enemies. But not all agree with his ways, and they came to punish him for distorting the bushido.

You are sure of one thing. One must fall. The question is...

Will him bow backward or forward?

Made in Unity, in a week of available free time, by two guys trying to remember how to make games. Was intended to be a mobile game, so if something is odd, it's because of it.

Gameplay: Attack faster than your opponent with a quick tap on the screen when it goes black.

Featuring:

  • Lots of trash talk to make the game look good!
  • Less than 1 minute of gameplay to make you suffer less from the horrible graphics!
  • References that we hope to not get sued for!
  • Writting adapted to the lack of time of the devs!
  • Coronavírus free!
  • No saves! Hardcore gaming! (Lack of features is a feature! >:D)
